summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a website related to scientists. The email indicates a personal connection, possibly regarding Staley's daughter, and contains a confidentiality notice.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing a website with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, inquiring about a website related to scientists.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are communicating about a personal matter, indicating a social connection.

keyFacts: The email was sent on November 29, 2009.
Epstein inquires if the website is for Staley's daughter.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
